data.name: Arakkoa
data.description:
The Neutral - Arakkoa [W]
Units:
-10% HP
+5% evasion
+2 MP regeneration

Buildings:
-5% HP for Barracks
Barracks have mana shield, instead of Repair

Upgrades:
+1Lv Magic

Magic:
Concussion (Gives enemy 25% chance to miss)
Slow Poison (Deals 12 damage/sec for 15 seconds)
Shadow Strike (Deals 125 damage in 200 AoE)
Final Sacrifice (Kills an enemy non-mechanical unit, gives 0.5 mana to main building)

Traits: Arakkoa are humanoid avians ready to defend their territory no matter what. Few have remained faithful to the light, most have harnessed the darkness and use it on the battlefield. While their initital weakness is a big flaw, it is compensated with strong magic and tough units in the late game

Difficulty: Expert
Created: by Ksay

auras.name: Brilliance Aura
auras.description:
+0.1 MP/s to units and buildings
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Slow Aura
auras.description:
-15% unit attack speed
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Thorns Aura
auras.description:
35 damage return shield
(units and buildings)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Exalted Oracle [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Darkness Master

Exalted Oracle replaces Oracle
Spellcaster
+5% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Orb of Fire (Orb Effect)
(10/15/20/25/30% for 20 area dmg)
(slows units for 0.3s)
Healing Shadow (Healing Spell)
(75/100/125/150/175 HP to a friendly unit)
Upgrades used:
Void Magic (Upgrades Abilities)
Arakkoa Armor
Darkness Master
Night's Embrace
Spell Resistance

Type: Unit Power

+75 HP

(20% for 30 damage, 0.8s stun)

(has half duration on Heroes)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

(20% to attack 2 extra targets)

Arakkoa Armor
Winged Arrows
Night's Embrace

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description: Buy Light Orb. Cost 1000 gold. Cooldown 30.

spells.description: Buy Shadow Orb. Cost 1000 gold. Cooldown 30.

spells.name: Combination
spells.description:
LLLLLL Live, Insect: A wave of healing that heal units and hero on the entire map for 10.000 HP

LLLLLS Unlimited Mana: Everything on the map increases its mana regeneration to 1 for 60 seconds

LLLLSS Total Annihilation: Deals 1000 damage to every structure on the map (including yours)

LLLSSS True Balance: Every hero that is currently on the map receives a random T3 Artifact

LLSSSS Madness: Summons 30 infernal to a random places on the map

LSSSSS Two head is better: Summons a neutral warrior at the map center to defend it. If someone kills him - the reward is 5000 gold (Good Luck)

SSSSSS The Fool: Something Good

towerUpgrades.name: Coup de Grace
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to cast Chain Lightning
Affects: Arakkoa Tower and Featherstrike
(hits up to 3 units)

Lv1: 15% chance, 40 damage
Lv2: 25% chance, 60 damage
Lv3: 35% chance, 80 damage
Lv4: 45% chance, 100 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Spell Resistance
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increased spell resistance
Affects: All Units

Lv1: +4% spell resist
Lv2: +8% spell resist
Lv3: +12% spell resist
Lv4: +16% spell resist

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Wisdom
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage to nearby units
Affects: Ravenguard

Lv1: +10% damage in 400 AoE
Lv2: +20% damage in 500 AoE
Lv3: +30% damage in 600 AoE
Lv4: +40% damage in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Void Wisp
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to spawn a Wisp
Affects: Your dying units

Lv1: 10% chance, has Healing Wave
heals 20/40/60/80 HP to 3 units
Lv2: 12% chance, has Breaking Armor
-2/-4/-6 armor
Lv3: 14% chance, has Spell Steal
20/10 sec cooldown
Lv4: 16% chance, has Rage
+15% attack rate for 60s

spells.name: Healing Wave 1
spells.description: Calls forth a wave of healing energy that bounces up to 3 times, healing 50 hit points to friendly units.

spells.name: Spoilage
spells.description:
Reduces an enemy unit's armor by 2 and gives vision of that unit.
Lasts 60 seconds.

spells.name: Spell Steal (Lv1)
spells.description: Steals a positive buff from an enemy unit and applies it to a friendly unit, or takes a negative buff from a friendly unit and applies it to an enemy unit.

spells.name: Rage
spells.description:
Increases a friendly unit's attack rate by 15%.
Lasts 60 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Wisdom
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage to nearby units
Affects: Ravenguard

Lv1: +10% damage in 400 AoE
Lv2: +20% damage in 500 AoE

Lv4: +40% damage in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Darkness Enthroned
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: revives with 50% HP, bonus dmg and attack rate
Affects: Initiate

Lv1: lasts for 5 sec, +8 damage, +10% attack rate
Lv2: lasts for 6 sec, +16 damage, +20% attack rate
Lv3: lasts for 7 sec, +24 damage, +30% attack rate
Lv4: lasts for 8 sec, +32 damage, +40% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Darkness Mastery
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to refresh cooldowns upon casting
Affects: Oracle

Lv1: 3% chance
Lv2: 6% chance
Lv3: 9% chance
Lv4: 12% chance

towerUpgrades.name: Winged Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Scout and Voron

Lv1: 10% to do 2.75x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 3x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 3.25x damage
Lv4: 40% to do 3.5x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Night's Embrace
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus regeneration to All Units/Buildings
Affects: All Units/Buildings
(buildings are invisible during the effect)

Lv1: +4/1 HP/sec for 50s, 4 min cooldown
Lv2: +6/2 HP/sec for 50s, 3 min cooldown
Lv3: +8/3 HP/sec for 50s, 2 min cooldown
Lv4: +10/4 HP/sec for 50s, 1 min cooldown

towerUpgrades.name: Night's Embrace
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus regeneration to All Units/Buildings
Affects: All Units/Buildings
(buildings are invisible during the effect)

Lv1: +4/1 HP/sec for 50s, 4 min cooldown
Lv2: +6/2 HP/sec for 50s, 3 min cooldown
Lv3: +8/3 HP/sec for 50s, 2 min cooldown
Lv4: +10/4 HP/sec for 50s, 1 min cooldown

towerUpgrades.name: Adaptation
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus hit points and hp regeneration
Affects: Ravenguard and Oracle

Lv1: 25 HP and +2 HP/s
Lv2: 50 HP and +4 HP/s
Lv3: 75 HP and +6 HP/s
Lv4: 100 HP and +8 HP/s
